snippet.title: Police arrest Townsville gunman
snippet.content: A MAN has been arrested in Townsville early this morning after he was allegedly seen riding a push bike with a gun. Worried witnesses called police after the man was seen with the firearm, with one witness telling police they had seen the man shoot the gun into a river. It's understood police found the man about 7.30am, although he did not have the gun on him at the time. Police will allege the man ran from them when they began questioning him about the gun. The man was tracked down and has told police where he dumped the gun. The firearm was located by police and the man was arrested. He is currently in custody, although has not been charged at this time. More information to come.
